_header: The white skin hath a sory lack
Subjects: sermons, verse in; body, parts of
_description: On white skin, in a Latin sermon — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
þe wyte skyn haȝ a sori lakfor non hit is wyte & non
                    hit is blak
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 69.
